doc.title: Fridays For Future – Register and Report strikes
doc.excerpt: Register/report your strike here. Use your power for a safe and healthy future. You matter.

main.p: Fill in gaps in the map and a start a strike in your city or area.
No matter how big or small your event might be, we need your help to strengthen our powerful movement.
It is easy. Simply fill out the short and easy form below. Your information will be added to our website and map.
main.head: Do you want to register a new or report an old strike?
map
main.p: Find all strikes and actions on this global Map!
